div.p: Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and read text-based posts of up to 140 characters.
More information can be found at this website.

The plugin calls the Electric Cloud tool's "EC-Twitter" command line and passes the user-provided parameters.
Note: Before you run the application from commander you need to authorize the EC-Twitter application, to do this follow the next steps:

ol.li: Download the command line application Here .
The application will open a browser and will show you an authorization code.
Copy that code, and paste it into the console.
Now you should see this message: "The tweet was tweeted successfully".
The application is ready to use from Commander.
